Class MouseCursor

java.lang.Object
minipaint.MouseCursor
public class MouseCursor extends Object
A data class that encapsulates the state of the mouse cursor on the canvas.

This includes its starting, last, and current coordinates, as well as whether the mouse is currently being dragged. It provides methods to update its state in response to mouse events.
